hooks.command: npm install --silent && echo '✓ Dependencies installed' && CHROME=$(find /root/.cache/ms-playwright -name chrome -type f -path '*/chrome-linux/chrome' 2>/dev/null | head -1) && ln -sf "$CHROME" /tmp/chromium && echo '✓ Chromium symlink created at /tmp/chromium' && (npm run dev > /tmp/eleventy-dev.log 2>&1 & echo $! > /tmp/eleventy-dev.pid && sleep 3 && if curl -sf http://localhost:8080/ > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo '✓ Dev server running at http://localhost:8080/'; else echo '⚠ Dev server starting (check /tmp/eleventy-dev.log)'; fi)
